definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: I am a Chinese armed police soldiers, I was on duty.
sentences.chinese: 緊急啊我是一名中國武警戰士，我正在值勤。

sentences.english: I am a Chinese police soldier . I am on duty now .
sentences.chinese: 緊急啊我是一名中國武警戰士，我正在值勤。

sentences.english: Some 287,000 soldiers have been called into flood-prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 28萬7千名武警戰士已經投入到防洪搶險的最前線。

sentences.english: Soldiers and armed police in Beijing also joined the army of sweepers.
sentences.chinese: 駐紮在北京的解放軍和武警戰士也加入了掃雪大軍。

sentences.english: Some 113, 080 Chinese soldiers and armed police have been mobilized to help with rescue operations.
sentences.chinese: 約113，080名官兵和武警戰士已奔赴災區救援。
